title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
description: This week, Stephen T. Stone takes both top spots on the insightful side. In first place, it’s a comment about Yelp asking the court to stop the Texas AG from suing them because they warn users about Crisis Pregnancy Centers, in response to a (snarky) question about what the issue is: Sincere answer to what […]
